pages.text: The Court of Gnomes is a structure found within Terramity, and is required to fight the first boss in the mod's progression.$(br2)The structure can be found only in dark forests and swamps.
$(l:terramity:bosses/gob)Gob, King of Gnomes$() can be summoned by right clicking the gold gnome statue found within the court with a $(l:terramity:misc/gnome_bartering)red gnome hat$().
